svrl:schematron-output.title: Test xml files that are of type dk-extension.rnc

svrl:active-pattern.name: Whenever condition attribute is used the element should have have an xml:id or cref attribute

svrl:failed-assert.svrl:text: There should be an xml:id or cref attribute

svrl:active-pattern.name: cref points to element with matching xml:id

svrl:failed-assert.svrl:text: cref does not point to element with matching xml:id
cref does not point to element with matching xml:id
